creator: jpyeron@pdinc.us

text:
I think this is a bug from the combination of the path "C:\program files\..." 
and a large list of jar files.

Try to move your Tomcat to path without spaces, I think the error would not 
show up regardless of the number of jar files.  If this is true, then this is 
an ANT bug for ANT version 1.5.x.  Tomcat 4.1.31 should have fixed this by 
upgrading ANT to 1.6.
creator: mdang@interwoven.com
